articles.description: England must "demand higher" from each other, says striker Alessia Russo after an underwhelming start to their Euro 2025 qualifying campaign.
articles.title: 'Poor' England must 'demand higher' in Euros qualifying

articles.description: Follow live text and BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra commentary from third practice and qualifying at the Japanese Grand Prix.
articles.title: Japanese Grand Prix final practice - radio & text

articles.description: Ander Herrera has won league titles and European trophies, but is chasing his father's dream with Athletic Bilbao.
articles.title: Herrera living out his father's dream in cup final

articles.description: Bronny James, the son of NBA legend LeBron, is to enter the 2024 NBA draft.
articles.title: Bronny James, son of LeBron, set to enter 2024 NBA draft

articles.description: World number one Ronnie O'Sullivan hits three century breaks in reaching the final of the Tour Championship with a 10-7 win over Gary Wilson.
articles.title: Tour Championship: Ronnie O'Sullivan reaches third final by beating Gary Wilson 10-7 in Manchester

articles.description: Tottenham boss Ange Postecoglou says he is not interested in signing players who are only keen to join the club if they qualify for the Champions League.
articles.title: I want people who want to come to Spurs - Postecoglou

articles.description: Warrington Wolves go top of Super League with a fine second-half performance to beat Leeds Rhinos.
articles.title: Super League: Leeds Rhinos 8-34 Warrington Wolves - Wire go top of table

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on darts stars Luke Littler and Nathan Aspinall to predict the outcome of this weekend's Premier League games.
articles.title: Sutton's Premier League predictions v darts stars Littler & Aspinall

articles.description: Rotherham become the first side in the EFL to be relegated this season after losing at home to fellow strugglers Plymouth Argyle.
articles.title: Rotherham relegated following loss to Plymouth

articles.description: The trunks worn by Muhammad Ali in his epic 'Thrilla in Manila' victory over Joe Frazier are expected to fetch more than $6m at auction.
articles.title: 'Thrilla in Manila': Muhammad Ali's iconic white trunks from epic bout expected to fetch $6m at auction
